resources.string: If you have a device with an AMOLED display, it is prone to habing images burnt into the screen. This app allows you to check for these burn ins with a series of colors. If any image stays on your screen or part of your screen is a different shade than another, that indicates something has been burnt into your screen. Click \"Start\" to begin. Click on your screen to change the color.
The test is done! If you saw anything other than just the solid colors, that means somethinf was burnt into your screen and you should have it looked at by a professional.
